casebody.data:
Michael BESEN, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
Sandra WEISS, Defendant-Respondent. C-404 September Term 2017
080105 Supreme Court of New Jersey. December 8, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000268-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs; and it is further

ORDERED that the notice of appeal is dismissed.
